せびる: (せびる) - to demand money; to pester; to extort
せぶる: (せぶる) - to sleep; to lie down
せめぎ合い: (せめぎあい) - conflict; fighting each other
せめぎ合う: (せめぎあう) - to fight each other
せや: (せや) - that is right; that is so; oh, right
せよ: (せよ) - granted that; even if; even though
せよと言う: (せよという) - to advise strongly; to insist (on something)
せられる: (せられる) - verb used as an honorific for others' actions; auxiliary verb used as an extreme honorific for others' actions
せり出す: (seridasu) - empurrar (algo) para fora, sobressair (pode ter uma nuance negativa), protuberar; surgir pela porta de acesso (no palco)
せる: (させる) - (せる is for 五段 verbs, させる for 一段; follows the imperfective form of  and  verbs; senses 1-3 of せる are sometimes abbreviated as 〜す) auxiliary verb indicating the causative; (usu. as 〜(さ)せてもらう, 〜(さ)せていただく, etc.) auxiliary verb indicating that one has been granted the permission to do something; (as 〜(さ)せられる, 〜あら(さ)せられる, 〜(さ)せ給う, etc.) auxiliary verb used as an honorific for others' actions
せんさく好き: (せんさくずき) - nosy person; busybody
せんとする: (せんとする) - to attempt to do something
せん孔機: (せんこうき) - drill; perforator; (hole) puncher; keypunch
せん断剛性: (せんだんごうせい) - shear modulus
せん断効果: (せんだんこうか) - shear effect; shearing effect
せん断強度: (せんだんきょうど) - shear strength
せん断弾性係数: (せんだんだんせいけいすう) - elastic shear modulus
せん断抵抗角: (せんだんていこうかく) - angle of shearing resistance
せん状骨: (せんじょうこつ) - scaphoid bone (in wrist near thumb)
せん頭: (せんとう) - point; pointed end; cusp
せーの: (セイノー) - all together now!; one, two, go!; ready, set, go!; heave, ho!; oops-a-daisy
ぜいご: (ぜいご) - scales of a horse mackerel; (keeled) scute
ぜいぜい: (ぜえぜえ) - gasping for breath; puffing and panting; wheezing
ぜえぜえ: (ぜえぜえ) - gasping for breath; puffing and panting; wheezing
ぜよ: (ぜよ) - (at sentence end) indicates emphasis, intention, etc.; (joc) (at sentence end) indicates emphasis, intention, etc.
ぜんご: (ぜいご) - scales of a horse mackerel; (keeled) scute
ぜんまい仕掛け: (ぜんまいじかけ) - clockwork (motor, etc.); spring action
そう: (そう) - so/really/seeming; (after masu stem and adj-stem) appearing that/seeming that/looking like/having the appearance of
そういうことか: (そういうことか) - I got it; I see; I now know; So that's the reason
そういうことなら: (そういうことなら) - that being the case; in that case; if that's how it's going to go
そういうもの: (そういうもん) - that's the way it is; such is life
そういうもん: (そういうもん) - that's the way it is; such is life
そういや: (souiya) - o que me lembra ..., pensando bem ..., agora que você mencionou ..., a esse respeito ..., então, se você diz ...
そういやあ: (そういやあ) - which reminds me ...; come to think of it ...; now that you mention it ...; on that subject ...; so, if you say ...
そううつ病: (そううつやまい) - manic depression; manic-depressive psychosis; bipolar disorder
そうかもしれない: (そうかもしれません) - you could say that
そうかもしれません: (そうかもしれません) - you could say that
そうこうしている内に: (そうこうしているうちに) - meanwhile; in the meantime
そうこうする内に: (そうこうするうちに) - in the meantime; meanwhile
そうさ: (そうさ) - yes, that's right; yep; sure thing
そうしたら: (そうしたら) - then; and then; and; if so; because then
そうして見ると: (そうしてみると) - when looked at in that way
そうしないと: (そうしないと) - otherwise; if not; or else
そうすりゃ: (そうすりゃあ) - if so; in that case; in that situation
そうすりゃあ: (そうすりゃあ) - if so; in that case; in that situation
そうする: (そうする) - to do so; to do thus
そうすると: (sousuruto) - tendo feito isso, se isso for feito, se for feito dessa maneira
そうだ: (そうです) - that is so/that is right/it looks to me/I am of the impression; people say that (after plain verb, adj)/it is said that/I hear that
そうっと: (そーっと) - softly; gently; quietly; secretly
そうです: (そうです) - that is so/that is right/it looks to me/I am of the impression; people say that (after plain verb, adj)/it is said that/I hear that
そうでない場合は: (そうでないばあいは) - if this is not the case
そうとも言える: (そうともいえる) - you could say that
そうなると: (sounaruto) - se for esse o caso, se isso acontecer, quando isso acontecer
そうなんです: (そうなんです) - yes; that is so
そうなんですか: (そうなんですか) - is that so?
そうなんですけどねぇ: (そうなんですけどねぇ) - that may be so
そうにない: (そうにない) - (after masu-stem of verb) showing no signs of (verb); extremely unlikely to (verb)
そうになった: (そうになった) - (after the -masu stem of a verb) almost (did); nearly (did)
そうはイカの金玉: (そうはイカのキンタマ) - (joc) (pun on そうは行かぬ) you wish!; that's not going to happen; not a chance
そうは問屋がおろさない: (そうはとんやがおろさない) - things don't work that well in the real world; things seldom go as one wishes; that is expecting too much; it won't be that easy
そうは問屋が卸さない: (そうはとんやがおろさない) - things don't work that well in the real world; things seldom go as one wishes; that is expecting too much; it won't be that easy
そうは烏賊の金玉: (そうはイカのキンタマ) - (joc) (pun on そうは行かぬ) you wish!; that's not going to happen; not a chance
そうは行かない: (そうはイカない) - not a chance; you wish!; that's not going to happen; that won't work
そうみたい: (そうみたい) - it seems so; that's what it looks like
そうもありません: (そうもありません) - (after -masu base of verb) very unlikely to (verb)
そうもない: (そうもありません) - (after -masu base of verb) very unlikely to (verb)
そうやって: (そうやって) - like that; that way; thus
そう囃: (そうざつ) - (嘈囃 is sometimes read むねやけ)  heartburn; sour stomach
そう来なくっちゃ: (そうこなくっちゃ) - I thought so; I suspected as much; Just as I thought; Now you are talking; That's the spirit
そう言う: (そうゆう) - such; like that; that sort of; very
そう言えば: (そういえば) - which reminds me ...; come to think of it ...; now that you mention it ...; on that subject ...; so, if you say ...
そう言った: (そういった) - like that; this type
そおき: (そおき) - Okinawan-style stewed pork spare ribs
